attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Television licence for a colour TV Licence costs £131.50 and a black and white licence costs £44.00.  Everybody who owns a television receiving equipment such as a TV set, set-top boxes, video or DVD recorders, computers or mobile phones to watch or record TV programmes as they are being shown on TV, are required by law to purchase a TV Licence. This petition is to abolish the TV Licence and let the BBC operate on a level playing field with the rest of the TV producers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
